body: I think right now we are not support returning list of tensors in the script, `split` is also a case we could not support as for now, it needs to wait until we have mutable list implemented (issue tracked here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8528). Right now for chunk we returns multiple outputs where each outputs is a DynamicType. I will mark a TODO here to fix the special cases after we have list implemented.

Right now for chunk we returns multiple outputs where each outputs is a DynamicType. I will mark a TODO here to fix the special cases after we have list implemented.

Right now for chunk we returns multiple outputs where each outputs is a DynamicType. I will mark a TODO here to fix the special cases after we have list implemented.
